Text: Learn how Walmartcom the worlds largest retailer manages its online applications with ProactiveNetsizeImagine managing the gigantic application infrastructure behind Walmartcom the web site that supports the nations retailer hosting more than stores nationwide When faced with this exact challenge Dan Peterson Director of Website OperationsEngineering for Walmartcom evaluated several tools and chose ProactiveNet Now Dan talks about his decision Join our live conference call with Dan Petersen and ProactiveNet CEO Ajay Singh to learn about Some of the challenges faced by the operations staff at Walmartcom The other products evaluated Why Walmartcom chose ProactiveNet The ProactiveNet install and deployment experience How ProactiveNet improved Walmartcom problem resolution efforts ProactiveNet delivers the next generation of application performance analysis tools designed to detect any performance degradation in the infrastructure pinpoint the root cause predict potential problems and initiate proactive actions long before any online applications or services are actually disrupted IN JUST THREE MOUSE CLICKS ProactiveNet gets you to the Root Cause of any application performance slow down and protects your valuable staff resources by instantly alerting the exact internal specialist needed to get the problem fixed When November pm PST Walmartcom Reference Call Please take the next step to see how ProactiveNet can help you PREDICT and SOLVE performance problems SAVE COSTS and dramatically improve your IT staffs QUALITY OF LIFE by joining us on this informative call To register visit confcallwalmartasp or call me directly Vicki Vance ProactiveNet Inc Manager Inside Sales Go from Fingerpointing to Pinpointing with ProactiveNet Gold Street Alviso CA Direct Fax A Crossroads AList Award Winning Technology Computer World Top Emerging Companies to Watch
